mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To elevate spirits through a fusion of Cuban vibrancy and cocktail mastery, igniting inspiration with every artfully crafted sip. Step into the energy of Havana, no passport required.

experience.title: Discover the Experience
experience.card1Text: From mojitos to daiquiris, indulge in handcrafted Cuban-inspired drinks that celebrate authentic flavor.
experience.card2Text: Immerse yourself in live salsa, rumba, and Cuban beats that bring Havana‚Äôs rhythm to the Strip.
experience.card3Text: Relax on our outdoor patio with premium Cuban cigars and a view of the Vegas lights.

about.title: Our Story
about.paragraph1: Born from the vibrant streets of Havana and the dazzling nights of Las Vegas,
about.paragraph1b: blends classic Cuban warmth with modern flair.
about.paragraph2: From live salsa rhythms to handcrafted cocktails, every night here is a celebration of life, flavor, and rhythm where the passion of Cuba meets the pulse of Vegas.
about.paragraph3: Step through our doors and be transported old Havana energy, modern Vegas vibes, and a welcoming spirit that feels like home.
